content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.F_SSTConsignment') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTConsignment
GO

IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_SSTConsignment') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_SSTConsignment
GO

GO
